summary: This is an email correspondence dated August 14, 2019, regarding a revised timeline related to Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC). It references a suicide attempt by Epstein on July 23, 2019, and his subsequent transport to a suicide watch unit, involving specific MCC staff and the U.S. Attorney's Office.

persons.name: Lt.
persons.context: Mentioned as supervising the night of Jeffrey Epstein's July 23, 2019 suicide attempt and responding to the incident.

events.title: Epstein Suicide Attempt at MCC
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein attempted suicide while incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. The Office responded and transported him to the suicide watch unit.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein attempted suicide on July 23, 2019, while in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).
Following the attempt, he was transported to a suicide watch unit.
An MCC lieutenant supervised the night of the incident and responded to it.
The email is part of correspondence revising a timeline related to Epstein's incarceration.
The correspondence involves the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
